name: fs25-mod-loader
description: FS25 Mod Loader for Windows (Electron + React + TS)
author: Your Name or Org

scripts.dev:main: tsup src/main/main.ts src/main/preload.ts --format cjs --external electron --splitting false --sourcemap --dts --watch --out-dir dist/main
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n RND,MAIN,ELEC -c blue,magenta,green "npm:dev:renderer" "npm:dev:main" "wait-on tcp:5173 dist/main/main.js && cross-env VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 electron ."
scripts.build:main: tsup src/main/main.ts src/main/preload.ts --format cjs --external electron --splitting false --sourcemap --dts --out-dir dist/main
scripts.build: rimraf dist && npm run build:renderer && npm run build:main
